ext_descriptions.ext_description: A pre_defined_type_qualifiers is a list of the pre-defined type qualifiers.

An Expanded_uncertainty is a type of
that specifies the factor of an uncertainty.
the multiplier of the uncertainty of the value.

A Measure_qualification is a means to provide information about measurements in which there is an associated uncertainty. The uncertainty may be specified as precision, qualitative uncertainty, or expanded uncertainty, and the type of the related datum shall be included. The uncertainty is defined in clause 2 of "The Guide to the Expression of Uncertainty in Measurement".

specifies the
for the Measure_qualification. There shall be one or more
for each qualifiers.

specifies the
for the Measure_qualification.
the text that provides further information about the Measure_qualification.
the words by which the Measure_qualification is known.

ext_description.p: The qualified_measure shall not be of type .
ext_description.note:
The
must be used in that case.

The members of qualifiers shall not include more than one member of
in it's set.

A Qualified_numerical_item_with_unit is a type of
and a type of
that specifies the type and uncertainty of a datum. The uncertainty may be specified as precision, qualitative uncertainty, or expanded uncertainty. The uncertainty is defined in clause 2 of "The Guide to the Expression of Uncertainty in Measurement".
the that specifies the type of datum of the Qualfied_numerical_item_with_unit.
A Type_qualifier is the specification of the type of a datum. A Type_qualifier is a .

ext_description.p: the words by which the Type_qualifier is known.

shall be in type of .

ext_description.p: A Precision_qualifier is a specification of the number of significant digits in the representation of a value. Precision_qualifier shall be interpreted in accordance with Precision_qualifier in part 45 of this standard.
ext_description.note: The precision is defined in clause 2 of "The Guide to the Expression of Uncertainty in Measurement".

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies the number of significant digits of the value.

A Qualified_representation_item is a type of
for which qualifiers are defined to describe its reliability and/or uncertainty.

specifies a role of the
for the Qualified_representation_item. There shall exist one or more value_qualifiers for the Qualified_representation_item.

ext_description.p:
An attribute qualifiers shall not contain more than one
in it's set.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: A Qualitative_uncertainty is a type of . The uncertainty is defined in clause 2 of "The Guide to the Expression of Uncertainty in Measurement".

ext_description.p: specifies a STRING for the Qualitative_uncertainty.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: A Standard_uncertainty is a type of . A Standard_uncertainty may be an . The uncertainty is defined in clause 2 of "The Guide to the Expression of Uncertainty in Measurement".
specifies a REAL value of the uncertainty.

An Uncertainty_qualifier is a supertype of a
or a . The uncertainty is defined in clause 2 of "The Guide to the Expression of Uncertainty in Measurement".
specifies the STRING that serves to identify the Uncertainty_qualifier.
the text that provides further information about the Uncertainty_qualifier.
